sources.first_edition: April, 1773, Paris, Vénier: Op. 11 no. 5 (for title, see No. 177).
later_editions: (c. 1775), Venice, Marescalchi-Canobbio: no. 4 (for title, see No. 180).
(c. 1780), Venice, Zatta: no. 4 (for title, see No. 180).
(c. 1780), London, Preston: Op. 11 no. 4 (for title, see No. 180).

(c. 1785), London, Welcker: Op. 11 no. 4 (for title, see No. 189).
(c. 1790?), Paris, Boyer: Op. 11 no. 5 (for title, see No. 177).

partial_notes: This appears to be a complete entry for G.181. The second movement shows 'Trio' and 'sotto voce' markings in the musical excerpt.
